P5706 【深基2.例8】再分肥宅水

Written on December 26th, 2024 by ZJM 
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	double a;
	int b;
	cin>>a>>b;
	cout<<setprecision(3)<<fixed<<a/b<<endl<<b*2;
	return 0;
}
